0.1.name: wordpress/title-icon
0.1.description:
Title Icon plugin

Displays a small icon or smiley in the title. You have to add <?php if (function_exists('the_title_icon')) the_title_icon(); ?> to your index.php, single.php, page.php, archive.php before or after the <?php the_title(); ?>

Title Icon plugin works together with:

  • LMB^Box Smileys plugin (http://aboutme.lmbbox.com/lmbbox-plugins/lmbbox-smileys/)
  • Smilies Themer plugin (http://rick.jinlabs.com/code/smilies-themer/)
